europeana:record.dc:title: A new species of Nearchus (Insecta: Phasmida: Phasmatidae) from Borneo, and a description of the male of N. redtenbacheri
Zoologische Mededelingen
europeana:record.dc:creator: Bragg P.E.
europeana:record.dc:subject: Insecta
Nearchus foliatus; N. redtenbacheri; Borneo; Kalimantan; Sabah; Mt Kinabalu
europeana:record.dc:description: Nearchus foliatus spec. nov. is described from a single female specimen collected in eastern Kalimantan in 1925. This species is readily distinguished from others in the genus by the large foliaceous lobes on the legs. A key to the genus is provided. The male and egg of N. redtenbacheri Dohrn are described for the first time; males of this genus have not been recorded previously.
europeana:record.dcterms:isPartOf: A new species of Nearchus (Insecta: Phasmida: Phasmatidae) from Borneo, and a description of the male of N. redtenbacheri (URN:ISSN:0024-0672) (Volume 69) (Issue 21)
